name: Out of Mana
description:
This is my first game which I made in GameMaker Studio 2.

Its only prototype of upcoming game. The game which you download have only one level, in the next release will be more levels.

Just extract and play, no installation required!

  • Leveling up system
  • Mana usage system
  • 3 kinds of Magic Staffs
  • One type of enemy (Just in this first pre-release)

Movement W,A,S,D

Spell MOUSE

Inventory SHIFT

The game is totaly free, but if you want, you can doante some bucks ;)
